PLAYLISTENCHANTMENT.Normalize: Normalize volume and start all playlist (except soundboards) tracks with this volume.
PLAYLISTENCHANTMENT.Fade: Fade between tracks (except soundboards). When a new track is started, all others are stopped.
PLAYLISTENCHANTMENT.soundPreview: Sound Preview, only you can hear the played sound.

CONTROL.play: Start all active playlist tracks (except soundboards)
CONTROL.resume: Resume all active playlist tracks (except soundboards)
CONTROL.next: Jump to next track of all active playlist tracks (except soundboards)
CONTROL.previous: Jump to previous track of all active playlist tracks (except soundboards)
